CVE-2016-2781.reference_policy:
Title: LOW - CVE-2016-2781 in coreutils: Non-privileged session can escape to the parent session in chroot
Scope: All systems using Unknown version 9.4-3ubuntu6.1
Severity: LOW
Impact: chroot in GNU coreutils, when used with --userspec, allows local users to escape to the parent session via a crafted TIOCSTI ioctl call, which pushes characters to the terminal's input buffer.
Remediation: Evaluate alternatives or apply mitigations for Unknown
Verification: Confirm Unknown version after update; re-scan with vulnerability scanner
